name: Stairway
description: A set of steps leading upward or downward, representing progress, elevation, and transitions between levels.

person: Someone who helps others advance or reach higher levels of achievement
A person who looks down on others or creates barriers to advancement
creatureTrap: Creatures that control vertical spaces or have climbing abilities
Traps triggered by movement between different levels or elevations
place: Multi-level structures that lead to important upper or lower areas
Dangerous vertical passages where falling poses significant risk
treasure: Rewards that become available only after achieving certain levels
Items that are difficult to transport between different elevations
situation: Clear progression toward higher goals or deeper understanding
Setbacks that force retreat to lower levels or starting over
